descriptor.name: Savitribai Phule Fellowship (SJSGC) Application Guide
descriptor.short_desc: A guide for single girl children on how to apply for the UGC's Ph.D. fellowship to secure financial support for research.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This course provides a detailed walkthrough of the Savitribai Jyotirao Phule Fellowship for Single Girl Child (SJSGC). It is designed to help agents guide eligible Ph.D. scholars through the entire application process on the UGC portal, ensuring all requirements for this prestigious fellowship are met.

  1. Financial Assistance Details:
    Understand the complete financial support structure, including the JRF/SRF fellowship amounts (₹31,000/₹35,000 p.m.), contingency grants, HRA norms, and other benefits like maternity leave.
  2. Eligibility Criteria:
    Master the specific eligibility rules, including the definition of a 'single girl child', age limits for different categories, and the requirement for full-time Ph.D. enrollment.
  3. Step-by-Step Online Application:
    Learn the 10-step online application process on the UGC portal, from initial registration and document uploads (photo, signature, affidavit) to the final declaration and submission.

Why Take This Course:

  • Empower talented female researchers to pursue higher education without financial constraints.
  • Specialize in a significant national fellowship scheme promoting women in academia.
  • Become an expert resource for navigating the UGC's application portal for research grants.
